reviewText: I love the variety of the horse stories and enjoy watching them alone or with my grandchildren. A must have if you love horses.

Bought these to watch with the grandkids and we all really enjoyed all but Riding Tornado. We started to watch it but the story line was to complicated for the little ones so we never did finish that 1 yet. We all really enjoyed Horse Crazy probably the kids new favorite horse movie. Good entertainment for the price. It also shipped very fast.

Some of these reminded me of the Saturday morning shows I watched as a kid. I know im dating myself but Fury and My friend Flicka comes to mind. they are good stories with good meanings of life. Good for the whole family. I like horses and any horse lover would enjoy these movies.
enjoyed the movies
I can't get caption on these movies, I am hearing impaired, but the movies are OK
good
Fun horse movies for the horse lover.
Good

I ordered this for my 10 year old granddaughter that loves horses and she was thrilled with new movies she hadn't seen. Would recommend for anyone loving horses. Good stories....exciting....and good quality.

Riding Tornado and A Father's Choice were the best out of the four movies.  I am so glad I purchased this DVD because I enjoy watching these two movies more then once.  Enjoyed the reality they showed about people's lives.

Great family entertainment. There aren't too many movies you can watch with your kids that hold the adults interest as well but this movie 4 pack is it! Clean movies for the kids and great plot lines that hold the adult's interest. My husband and I loved them.

Everything came in in a timely manner and was as advertised.  On the candles, this was the best price around.  We have not used the firepit and have used the candles just a few times, but I don't expect there to be a problem.
If you want to see some bad acting take a look at this DVD.  It is full of them.  Story lines were bad on three of the four. Don't waste your time or money on this one.
junk this dvd  is terriable really poor acting will never buy a four pack again really is junk no good
My daughter has already watched all four movies at least three times. I'm just glad there's a DVD player in her room ;)
I am an avid horse person  so I escape to the movies . Give me a special spiritual connection .
The love this idea of 2 discs each with 2 movies on it.  The sound & quality are top quality.
I enjoyed all the movies, Father's Choice and Tiding Tornado were my favorite. Good family pictures with life lessons and choices to then talk about.

I had this DVD sent to an old friend who has always loved horses. Since she has had a couple of strokes, she had a hard time realizing the package was from me and has never told me if she ever looked at the movies. I'm sure when she does she'll enjoy them. I was glad to find something I could send her for such a good price.

I bought this DVD cuz it has 4 movie pack, and two of them worked with me whic are : Horse Crazy & Riding Ternado. That is all!!
it comes with 2 DVDs, each DVD has to side and there should be a movie for each side, however only one side is working from each DVD!!
I am so disappointed because I invested my money on actually 2 movies not 4 !!
I did my best to try the DVD on more than laptop and DVD player but it still the problem not working!
I would not recommend this product or even dealing with seller.

Thanks
I would not buy them again.  I like to be entertained by happy stories. But it seems there is always so sad in a story about a horse...; (

This movie was enjoyable but nothing stood out as being above average.  I like animal movies and so does my grand-daughter.  We are happy that we purchased it and will be able to watch it again when inclined to do so.
These were all great movies.  They were done well and have very good messages.  I had not heard of three of these.  Movies I will enjoy over and over again.
These movies weren't really about the horse as much as it was about the people. I was expecting movies about the horses more. Still, they are okay to watch if you just enjoy seeing horses.
Thix was bought for a friend. She liked it very much
We've watched these movies many, many times. They're a good purchase to keep in  your library.

was ok. not what I expected.
